description:
Verify that a user can successfully add a new category with a custom name and color.

Go to the Categories management screen in the app.
Click on the field to enter a new category name (e.g., "Hobby").
Choose a color for the category from the color selection options.
Click the "Create Category" button.
Observe the confirmation message and check that the new category appears in the category list.

Click the 'Categories' option in the menu

description:

description:
Verify that a user can select and purge (bulk delete) specific tasks, and that the selected tasks are accurately removed from the task database.

Navigate to the "Purge Tasks" screen in the app.
Review the list of done tasks and not done tasks.
Select one or more tasks by ticking their respective checkboxes.
Click the "PURGE SELECTED" button.
Observe the confirmation message indicating which tasks were purged.
Check the main task list to confirm the selected tasks are no longer present.

Click the 'PURGE SELECTED' button to delete the selected tasks
